metadata.title: FantaLook Short Silver Cosplay Wig with Glass for Halloween
features: Package Included:1 Wig + 1 Pair of Glasses + 1 Wig Cap
CUSTOM DESIGNED: Watching 80S theme videos multiple times in return for a better hair style design.
NATURAL: 100% heat-resistant synthetic fiber, which seems more natural, can be permed by iron for DIY your own style.
ADJUSTABLE: High quality inside net cap with two adjustable straps which can be intertwined to a fixed position to suitable American head sizes.
